messages.text: Didn't sleep well last night. Was really worried about Sapir's 5 AM bus ride, unprotected bus during wartime, traveling alone, through the territories. Really couldn't sleep because of it. Terrifying. Really.

quote.text: Didn't sleep well last night. Was really worried about Sapir's 5 AM bus ride, unprotected bus during wartime, traveling alone, through the territories. Really couldn't sle…

messages.text: Same here, just the other way around. Couldn't fall asleep and at 2:30 I literally forced myself and told myself it doesn't help her that I'm not sleeping.
Were you worried about her ride home?

quote.text: And how is Sapir handling this?

messages.text: Sapir is Sapir. I'm sure it's hard for her but she has her own way.

quote.text: Were you worried about her ride home?
